channel.title: I Portforwarded and my server still says "Server offline/Error connecting server
channel.description: ive portforwarded and im still getting this error: its either "error connecting to server" or "server is offline" i dont know what to do the gui is changed to my ip and everything....the source runs fine but idk...plz help -Darien

item.title: I Portforwarded and my server still says "Server offline/Error connecting server
item.dc:creator: @master_roshi master roshi
item.description:
@master_roshi wrote:

make sure ur computer accepts ports 43594 that was my problem
